property.caption: Context Object
property.description: Whether this widget is in the context of another entity

property.caption: Enable Controls
property.description: Show controls on carousel (the two side arrows)

property.caption: Enable Wrap
property.description: This toggles whether the carousel wraps back from the last image to the first.

property.caption: Scroll Speed
property.description: Lower number higher speed and vice versa (Milseconds)

property.caption: Id
property.description: If you use more than one carousel in a page. Please make these different else this will cause errors.

property.caption: Class For The DIV
property.description: Give a class to the whole container

property.caption: Forms
property.description: These are the forms to be shown in the carousel.

property.caption: Form
property.description: Carousel form, should have the same context object as the widget.
